topics.body:
Been watching game of thrones and I'm almost through the first season

It's good and I plan on watching the rest but.... I dunno, there's something about the TV drama format that bugs me and has always bugged me. I can't quite place it but I felt the same thing with lost and breaking bad. 

Also it reminds me a lot of the witcher 2. Maybe it's just because this and the witcher are the only heavily political fantasy stories I've been exposed to.
